messages.message:
Hey team,
You will now notice that you get an option during sandbox creation time on Admiral named "tenant type". These types align with our Instabase Sandbox Policy (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cBZkqmCAFtXOaQ_jGx9EyKxwWGliuoHVEcctD1ODfk4/edit#heading=h.956c44t3xn25), so please check that document for more details, but here's a quick summary:
• `CUSTOMER` - should only be used for customer facing boxes (eg. PoV, demos, etc.)
• `PERSONAL` - any sandbox created by an individual for platform testing
• `TEAM_SHARED` - sandboxes shared by a team dev/testing purposes
Existing sandboxes will be updated by next week - we'll send another announcement when that is completed so owners can verify the correct type has been assigned.

Cool!

What should our release sandboxes fall under?
I’m assuming `TEAM_SHARED` , but wanted to check
